489450.name: Fantasy Grounds - Deadlands Reloaded: The Flood
489450.description:
Deadlands Reloaded: The Flood

Savage Worlds Deadlands Mega-Adventure for Fantasy Grounds II
In 68 the Great Quake shattered California from top to bottom, leaving a maze of windswept mesas and perilous sea channels brimming with precious ghost rock. The Rail Wars raged as Rail Barons fought to reach Californias riches first. Only one of them can lock up the Mazes lucrative ghost rock trade, and first they have to go through Reverend Grimme and his fervent followers!
The Flood gives you all you need to explore the Weird West Coast-a complete Plot Point campaign, details on the strange locales and famouse personages of the Maze, new Martial Arts Edges and weapons for kung fu masters, steam vessels, and a whole mess o Savage Tales to boot.
Your seats reserved on the Lost Angels express, amigo. Next stop-the Great Maze!
Contains:
  • Player's Guide
    • New Edges
    • New Hindrances
    • Expanded Martial Arts - The Chinese Fighting Arts
    • New Goods and Gear
    • Seven Tombstone Epitaph Articles to get the campaign started off right
  • Marshall's Guide
    • All boxed text, Marshall notes, maps and images from the Plot Points, backstory, and side adventures
    • including 32 Savage Tales
    • including 10 major plot points
    • Good Intentions clippings to share with players
    • Info for Random Tables to generate Maze Encounters and more
    • Full stats entered for 29 Critters and 84 Humans* drag and drop to the PCS window for ready-made player sheets in your own DLRL campaigns[/list][/list]
      Requires:       The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the Savage Worlds
      v3 Ruleset and the Deadlands Setting for Fantasy Grounds
      Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Michael Grancey
      Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Michael Grancey
      Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
